name: Squishmallows Ultimate Slime Mix'Ins, 10-Pack, Glitter & Cloud Slime, 8 Fun Add Ins, Pre-Made for Kids, Crunchy, Bulk, Great 6 Year Old Toys, Super Soft Sludge Toy
short_description: 10 READY-MADE SLIMES: From green kiwi to red red strawberry, yellow pineapple, blue raspberry, purple cake — every scented slime included in this set comes pre-made, allowing for instant sensory fun without the hassle (or mess!) of measuring and mixing ingredients or cleaning up.
REUSABLE: The slimes come in resealable and reusable containers, ensuring long-lasting sensory play, easy storage, and on-the-go fun!

JUST MIX & PLAY: Ooey-gooey glitter or soft and fluffy slime? This set comes with the best of both worlds for the ultimate sensory exploration. Customize and explore fun textures and irresistible scents with 8 different mix-ins, including crunchy sequins, soft sprinkles, bumpy beads, squishy mini foam balls, shredded glitter, and more!
MORE TO SQUISH: Each slime comes with exclusive rubber charms of your favorite mini Squishmallows, making the experience even more delightful for any fan — Squad up!

SET INCLUDES: 1 Packet Mixed Sequins (5g), 1 Packet Mini Rainbow Foam Balls (1g), 1 Packet Shredded Gold Glitter (3g), 1 Packet Rainbow Polymer Sprinkles (2g), 50 Faceted Jewel Beads, 3 Rubber Squishmallows Charms, 1 Packet Glitter (1g), 5 Scented Cloud Slimes (1 oz. Each), 5 Scented Glitter Slimes (1 oz. Each)
product_description: Grow your Squishmallows Squad with the Original Squishmallows Ultimate Slime Mix-Ins! This set comes with 10 resealable containers of ready-made sweet-smelling slime and 8 rainbow mix-ins. Each resealable jar of fun contains 8 oz. of cute slime in a rainbow of colors, glitter, texture, and irresistible scents. They all feature your favorite Squishmallows, from Cam to Archie, Wendy, and more! Pre-made slime means you can skip the messy measuring and get right to the sensory fun — just open and play! Sprinkle your choice of textures into the slime, from crunchy colorful sequins and beads to bumpy rainbow foam balls, then stretch it, poke it, twist it, and squeeze it! Combining slime as soft and fluffy as Squishmallows with textured treats makes for the sweetest tactile experience both kids and adults will love. Return the slimes to their containers for more to squish whenever and wherever you wish! This kids slime set is great as a Squishmallows Halloween party favor or gift for anyone who loves a good slime making kit! Recommended for any Squishmallows fan ages 6 and up.
